# How to Download and Install EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro
 
EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro is a powerful and easy-to-use tool for MySQL database administration and development. It allows you to manage MySQL servers and databases, create and modify database objects, run SQL queries, import and export data, compare and synchronize databases, and more.

If you are looking for a reliable and efficient solution for your MySQL database management needs, you can download EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro from the official website[^1^] or from other trusted sources. In this article, we will show you how to download and install EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro on your Windows PC.
 
## Step 1: Download EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro
 
To download EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro, you need to have a valid license key that you can purchase from the official website[^1^] or from other authorized resellers. Once you have the license key, you can follow these steps:
 
- Go to the official website[^1^] and click on the "Download" button.
- Select the "EMS SQL Management Studio for MySQL" option and click on the "Download" button again.
- Choose the "EMS SQL Manager for MySQL" option and click on the "Download" button once more.
- Save the file "msmanager.zip" to your preferred location on your PC.
- Extract the file "msmanager.zip" using a file archiver program such as WinZip or WinRAR.
- Run the file "setup.exe" to start the installation wizard.

## Step 2: Install EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro
 
To install EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro, you need to follow these steps:

- Accept the license agreement and click on the "Next" button.
- Enter your name, company name, and license key and click on the "Next" button.
- Select the destination folder where you want to install EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro and click on the "Next" button.
- Select the components that you want to install and click on the "Next" button.
- Select the start menu folder where you want to create shortcuts and click on the "Next" button.
- Select whether you want to create a desktop icon and a quick launch icon and click on the "Next" button.
- Click on the "Install" button to begin the installation process.
- Wait for the installation to complete and click on the "Finish" button.

## Step 3: Launch EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro
 
To launch EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro, you can either double-click on the desktop icon or select it from the start menu or quick launch bar. You will see a splash screen followed by a registration dialog box where you need to enter your name, company name, and license key again and click on the "OK" button.
 
You will then see the main window of EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro where you can start working with your MySQL servers and databases.
  
## Why Use EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro?
 
EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro is a comprehensive and versatile tool that offers many benefits for MySQL database users. Some of the main features and advantages of EMS MySQL Manager v2.8.6.2 Pro are:

- It supports all the latest versions of MySQL server, including MySQL 8.0, 5.7, 5.6, 5.5, and more.
- It has a user-friendly and intuitive interface that allows you to perform various tasks with ease and efficiency.
- It has a powerful SQL editor that supports syntax highlighting, code completion, code formatting, code templates, and more.
- It has a visual query builder that helps you create complex SQL queries without writing any code.
- It has a database designer that helps you create and modify database schemas graphically.
- It has a data generator that helps you populate your databases with realistic test data.
- It has a data import and export wizard that supports various formats such as CSV, XML, HTML, Excel, and more.
- It has a database comparison and synchronization tool that helps you compare and sync data and structure between different databases.
- It has a report designer that helps you create and print professional-looking reports based on your data.
- It has a database backup and restore tool that helps you protect your data from loss or damage.
